description: Vaccines will never be safe because the entire point of vaccinations is to cause debilitating neurological damage and create a sick and diseased population. Take one look around our society today and you’ll see this to be true. Children wearing helmets. Teenagers still in diapers. Kids everywhere with allergies, adhd, autoimmune problems, autism and cancer. ALL of which have been skyrocketing since the vaccination scheduled increased. All by design.
